echo "put  'customer',  'jsmith',  'addr:state', 'ON'"|hbase shell -n
echo "put  'customer',  'jsmith',  'order:numb', '123456'"|hbase shell -n

paragraphs.text:
##delete a column
echo "delete 'customer','njones','addr:city'"|hbase shell -n
##delete a column family, below does not work
##delete   'customer',  'jsmith',   'addr'
##below works
echo "alter 'customer','delete'=>'addr'"|hbase shell -n
##Clean up
echo "disable 'customer'"|habse shell -n
echo "drop 'customer'"|habse shell -n
